trans-unit.source: Step 5(a): Create the SQL Server Table
trans-unit.target: Step 5(a): Create the SQL Server Table

trans-unit.source: In this step, you create the SQL Server table in which the insurance claims received from Northwind Traders are inserted.
trans-unit.target: In this step, you create the SQL Server table in which the insurance claims received from Northwind Traders are inserted.

trans-unit.source: The name of the table is <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: The name of the table is <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: You can either copy-paste the script provided in this topic or use the script (<legacyItalic>OnPremSQLServer_Claims.sql</legacyItalic>) included as part of the <embeddedLabel>FlatFile_Bridge</embeddedLabel> solution available from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=249449</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=249449</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can either copy-paste the script provided in this topic or use the script (<legacyItalic>OnPremSQLServer_Claims.sql</legacyItalic>) included as part of the <embeddedLabel>FlatFile_Bridge</embeddedLabel> solution available from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=249449</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=249449</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The script assumes that you already have an <embeddedLabel>InsuranceData</embeddedLabel> database created and creates the <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel> table under that database.
trans-unit.target: The script assumes that you already have an <embeddedLabel>InsuranceData</embeddedLabel> database created and creates the <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel> table under that database.

trans-unit.source: To create the SQL Server table
trans-unit.target: To create the SQL Server table

trans-unit.source: Open SQL Server Management Studio and run the following query against the database where you want to create the <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: Open SQL Server Management Studio and run the following query against the database where you want to create the <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the table is created in the target database.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the table is created in the target database.
